member.name: T:Kentico.Builder.Web.Mvc.ComponentRegister`2
member.summary: A thread-safe register of components.
member.typeparam: The type of the keys in the register.
The type of the components in the register.
member.remarks: The register is optimized for read operations while modifications to the register are less efficient.

member.name: M:Kentico.Builder.Web.Mvc.ComponentRegister`2.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{`0})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified .
member.param: Comparer to be used for keys.

member.name: M:Kentico.Builder.Web.Mvc.ComponentRegister`2.TryAdd(`0,`1)
member.summary: Tries to add a new key and value to the register, if given is not already present.
member.param: The key of the element to add.
member.returns: Returns true if register did not contain and the new element was added. Otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:Kentico.Builder.Web.Mvc.ComponentRegister`2.TryAddUnsafe(`0,`1)
member.summary: Tries to add a new key and value to the register, if given is not already present. This method is not thread-safe.
member.param: The key of the element to add.
member.returns: Returns true if register did not contain and the new element was added. Otherwise returns false.
member.remarks: This member is not thread-safe while providing optimal performance of the modification operation.

member.name: M:Kentico.Builder.Web.Mvc.ComponentRegister`2.TryGetValue(`0,`1@)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with the specified key.
member.param: The key of the value to get.
Value associated with the key, if found, or the default value for the type.
member.returns: Returns true if is found. Otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:Kentico.Builder.Web.Mvc.ComponentRegister`2.GetAll
member.summary: Gets all values registered within the register.
member.returns: Returns enumeration of all registered values.
